description: Triangle of numbers associated with Genocchi numbers.
references: G. Kreweras, Sur les permutations compte'es par les nombres de Genocchi..., Europ. J. Comb., vol. 18, pp. 49-58, 1997.

crossrefs: Columns include A000366 and A102078. Row sums are in A000366.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
